ProfileCard.Description: QA Engineer focused on quality, automation, and delivering reliable software.

DescriptionCard.Content: QA Engineer with experience in manual and automated testing, working to ensure the quality of web and mobile applications. I work with test automation, CI/CD pipelines, and requirement validation, always aiming to reduce production issues and improve user experience through well-defined processes and efficient testing.

DetailsCard.Card2: Currently studying: Software Testing, Automation, and QA Best Practices...
DetailsCard.Card3: Interests: Software Quality | Automation | CI/CD | Reliability Engineering.

TechsCard.Title: Tools and Technologies
TechsCard.Description: Tools and technologies I use to ensure quality, stability, and confidence in digital products.

Projects.title: Featured Cases
Projects.description: From requirements analysis to test automation, my projects reflect a commitment to quality, reliability, and continuous improvement in software.

Contact.rightMessage: With tests as a tool, I transform requirements into reliable software, preventing failures before they reach the end user.
Contact.about: Based in Recife, Brazil, I am a QA Engineer focused on quality, automation, and continuous improvement. I believe that clear processes, efficient testing, and collaboration between teams are essential to building robust, scalable, and user-centered products.
